doc.title: Pehli Nazar Ka Pehla Pyaar: Love at First Sight
doc.plot: Pratik marries Shraddha with the family blessing, moves her far away from home and they begin a beautiful life together until tragedy strikes. Widowed, he takes his son Lucky back to India to meet Shraddha's family, only to encounter Annu, her younger sister who fell in love with him years ago at first sight. Karan, Annu's childhood friend loves her, an seeks Pratik's help in winning her. Annu and Pratik love each other, but will the family approve?
